name: Gravitatem
description:
*Note: I am aware that the mute stops working after starting a new level. I'm working on a fix.

Instructions

Hit full screen twice to get full screen(Sorry!)

Collect coins until level is cleared. Some levels are harder than others, but all are possible.

PC Users: Use arrows on keyboard to move, up to control gravity. Must use on screen arrows for bonus level.

Mobile Users: Use on screen arrows to move, tap anywhere else to control gravity. Note: Will only work on some mobile web browsers

Both: Tap "End Level" when done. Do not share to facebook(Broken in the format I uploaded).
